scripts.build: pnpm run build:css && pnpm run build:dist
scripts.dev: pnpm run sync && concurrently -k -n css,sync,serve -c blue,green,yellow "tailwindcss -i ./landing.css -o ./dist/styles/landing.css --watch" "chokidar './index.html' '../assets/**/*' -c 'pnpm run sync'" "browser-sync start --server dist --files 'dist/**/*' --no-open"
